verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came again unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> against the Ammonites <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5983><s%>, and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against them;

And say <S%H559><s%> unto the Ammonites <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5983><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Because thou saidst <S%H559><s%>, Aha <S%H1889><s%>, against my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, when it was profaned <S%H2490><s%>; and against the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when it was desolate <S%H8074><s%>; and against the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, when they went <S%H1980><s%> into captivity <S%H1473><s%>;

Behold, therefore I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> thee to the men <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%> for a possession <S%H4181><s%>, and they shall set <S%H3427><s%> their palaces <S%H2918><s%> in thee, and make <S%H5414><s%> their dwellings <S%H4908><s%> in thee: they shall eat <S%H398><s%> thy fruit <S%H6529><s%>, and they shall drink <S%H8354><s%> thy milk <S%H2461><s%>. men: Heb. children

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> Rabbah <S%H7237><s%> a stable <S%H5116><s%> for camels <S%H1581><s%>, and the Ammonites <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5983><s%> a couchingplace <S%H4769><s%> for flocks <S%H6629><s%>: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Because thou hast clapped <S%H4222><s%> thine hands <S%H3027><s%>, and stamped <S%H7554><s%> with the feet <S%H7272><s%>, and rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> in heart <S%H5315><s%> with all thy despite <S%H7589><s%> against the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; hands: Heb. hand feet: Heb. foot heart: Heb. soul

Behold, therefore I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon thee, and will deliver <S%H5414><s%> thee for a spoil <S%H957><s%> <S%H897><s%> to the heathen <S%H1471><s%>; and I will cut thee off <S%H3772><s%> from the people <S%H5971><s%>, and I will cause thee to perish <S%H6><s%> out of the countries <S%H776><s%>: I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> thee; and thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. a spoil: or, meat

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Because <S%H3282><s%> that Moab <S%H4124><s%> and Seir <S%H8165><s%> do say <S%H559><s%>, Behold, the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> is like unto all the heathen <S%H1471><s%>;

Therefore, behold, I will open <S%H6605><s%> the side <S%H3802><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> from the cities <S%H5892><s%>, from his cities <S%H5892><s%> which are on his frontiers <S%H7097><s%>, the glory <S%H6643><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%>, Bethjeshimoth <S%H1020><s%>, Baalmeon <S%H1186><s%>, and Kiriathaim <S%H7156><s%>, side: Heb. shoulder of Moab

Unto the men <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%> with the Ammonites <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5983><s%>, and will give <S%H5414><s%> them in possession <S%H4181><s%>, that the Ammonites <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5983><s%> may not be remembered <S%H2142><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>. with: or, against the children of Ammon
And I will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> upon Moab <S%H4124><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Because that Edom <S%H123><s%> hath dealt <S%H6213><s%> against the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> by taking <S%H5358><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%>, and hath greatly <S%H816><s%> offended <S%H816><s%>, and revenged <S%H5358><s%> himself upon them; by: Heb. by revenging revengement

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; I will also stretch out <S%H5186><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon Edom <S%H123><s%>, and will cut off <S%H3772><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> from it; and I will make <S%H5414><s%> it desolate <S%H2723><s%> from Teman <S%H8487><s%>; and they of Dedan <S%H1719><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>. they: or, they shall fall by the sword unto Dedan

And I will lay <S%H5414><s%> my vengeance <S%H5360><s%> upon Edom <S%H123><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and they shall do <S%H6213><s%> in Edom <S%H123><s%> according to mine anger <S%H639><s%> and according to my fury <S%H2534><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> my vengeance <S%H5360><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Because the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> have dealt <S%H6213><s%> by revenge <S%H5360><s%>, and have taken <S%H5358><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> with a despiteful <S%H7589><s%> heart <S%H5315><s%>, to destroy <S%H4889><s%> it for the old <S%H5769><s%> hatred <S%H342><s%>; for the: or, with perpetual hatred

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the Cherethims <S%H3774><s%>, and destroy <S%H6><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> coast <S%H2348><s%>. sea coast: or, haven of the sea

And I will execute <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> vengeance <S%H5360><s%> upon them with furious <S%H2534><s%> rebukes <S%H8433><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, when I shall lay <S%H5414><s%> my vengeance <S%H5360><s%> upon them. great vengeance: Heb. great vengeances
